text: I can't not have an assistant.
I'll tell her I know what you... You'll tell her what?
I know what you really are, Alfred.
I don't want to hear it anymore!
Oh, you think I can live like this?
You think I'd bloody enjoy living like this?
Well, what do you want from me?
I want... I want you to be honest with me.
I'm looking for an old friend.
It's good to see you, John.
You always had a good eye for publicity.
A wise man once told me obsession was a young man's game.
You want to design a show around it?
Yeah, I don't want you backstage.
I need you front of house managing.
I need you to call in any favors or connections you have left to get us the right booking for the run.
What sort of booking you after?
The sort that Borden can't ignore.
What an honor it is to see you again, sir.
You told me you only wanted to show me one trick.
It's a very clever trick, Mr. Ackerman.
Pleased to meet you, Mr. Ackerman.
Well, let's get on, shall we?
But he has to come back.
There has to be a... A prestige.
It's very rare to see real magic.
It's been many years since I've seen it.
Are you interested in helping us?
But you'll have to dress it up a little.
Give them enough reason to doubt it.
You haven't spoken about her, Freddy, not once.
Why would I talk about her to you?
Because she was a part of your life.
You know, the day before she killed herself, she said she wanted to meet me.
That she had something to tell me about you.
I was such a coward, I couldn't bring myself to face her.
You want to know the truth about me?
The truth is that I never loved Ciara.
You had a child with her.
